code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{eachproductData}from'./action';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{getNumber}from'./action';import{basketAction}from'./action';import{countInStockShow}from'./action';import{getPrice}from'./action';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Product=function Product(){var params=useParams();var eachproduct=useSelector(function(state){return state.eachproduct;});var basket=useSelector(function(state){return state.basket;});var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){dispatch(eachproductData(params));},[]);var check=basket.findIndex(function(basket){return basket.name==eachproduct.name;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{backgroundColor:"darkgray",height:"500px",margin:"50px",padding:"30px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{fontStyle:"italic",fontWeight:"bold",textAlign:"center"},children:[" ",eachproduct.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{fontStyle:"italic"},children:[" Brand : ",eachproduct.brand]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{fontStyle:"italic"},children:["  Price : ",eachproduct.price,"$"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{fontStyle:"italic"},children:[" Description : ",eachproduct.description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:eachproduct.image,style:{height:"200px"}}),!eachproduct.countInStock?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{float:"right",margin:"100px",fontStyle:"italic",color:"red"},children:" Is not available"}):check===-1?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{float:"right",margin:"100px",fontStyle:"italic"},onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(basketAction(basket));dispatch(getNumber());dispatch(getPrice());eachproduct.countInStock=eachproduct.countInStock-1;},children:" add to basket"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{float:"right",margin:"100px",fontStyle:"italic",color:"green"},children:" Existing Item "})]});};
